trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: 在阳光下时，楚霸王在攻击卷上有劣势，在依靠视觉的智慧检查上也有劣势（（%0%））。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} 命中，距离 1.5 米，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) 穿刺伤害。如果目标是生物，则必须在 {@dc 13} 力量蓄力中成功，否则会被击倒 {@condition prone}。

action.name: Drain Blood
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} 击中 1.5 米外的一个 {@condition prone}、{@condition incapacitated} 或 {@condition restrained} 的生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) 坏死伤害。目标必须在{@dc 13}宪法蓄力中成功，否则其最大命中点会减少与所受伤害等量的点数，而楚巴卡布拉会恢复与所受伤害等量的点数。减伤效果持续到目标完成长时间休息。如果该效果将目标的最大命中点数降至 0，则目标死亡。

reaction.name: Pin
entries: 如果卓柏卡布拉周围 1.5 米内的生物站起来，卓柏卡布拉就可以利用其反应进行咬人攻击。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果年长的恐龙在拯救动作中失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 年长的恐龙在对抗法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: 老年恐龙对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

trait.name: Uniqueness
entries: 所有六只年长的恐龙都有这些统计数据：{@creature Elder Dinosaur (Etali, Primal Storm)|PSX|Etali, Primal Storm}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Ghalta, Primal Hunger)|PSX|Ghalta, Primal Hunger}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Nezahal, Primal Tide)|PSX|Nezahal, Primal Tide}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Tetzimoc, Primal Death)|PSX|Tetzimoc, Primal Death}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Zacama, Primal Calamity)|PSX|Zacama, Primal Calamity}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Zetalpa, Primal Dawn)|PSX|Zetalpa, Primal Dawn}

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: 距离长老恐龙 36 米范围内的所有生物都必须在 {@dc 17} 智慧蓄力中成功，否则会在 1 分钟内变成 {@condition frightened}。如果长老恐龙在视线范围内，则该生物在每个回合结束时都可以重复该蓄力一击，如果成功则终止对自身的影响。如果生物的蓄力成功或效果结束，则该生物在接下来的 24 小时内免疫长老恐龙的 "恐怖存在"。

action.name: Swallow
entries: 长老恐龙可以对它正在抓取的大型或小型生物发动一次咬合攻击。如果攻击命中，该生物将受到咬伤的伤害，目标被吞下，抓取结束。在被吞食期间，该生物会受到 {@condition blinded} 和 {@condition restrained} 的伤害，它可以完全抵御长老恐龙的攻击和其他影响，并且在长老恐龙的每个回合开始时都会受到 56（{@damage 16d6}）次酸性伤害。如果长老恐龙在单个回合中受到来自体内生物的 60 或更多伤害，它必须在该回合结束时在（%3%）体质蓄力中成功，否则就会反刍所有被吞下的生物，这些生物会（%4%）掉落在距离它 3 米以内的空间中。如果长老恐龙死亡，被吞下的生物将不再受到它的（%5%）影响，并且可以通过 6 米的移动距离逃离尸体，离开（%6%）。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 老恐龙进行一次爪子攻击、尾巴攻击、翅膀攻击或翻板攻击。

legendary.name: Move
entries: 年长的恐龙移动到它的一半速度。

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 年长的恐龙进行一次咬合攻击或使用它的燕子。

items.name: Lightning Storm
entries: 长老恐龙总是伴随着汹涌的雷暴，类似于（%0%）法术的效果。当长老恐龙被激怒或变得暴躁时，只要它在室外，一个高 3 米、半径 18 米的圆柱体形状的风暴云就会立即在它上空 3 米处形成。在它的每个回合中，作为一个动作，长老恐龙可以选择它能看到的 36 米范围内的一个点。一道闪电从云层中闪落到该点上。距离该点 3 米内的每个生物都必须进行 {@dc 20} 灵巧蓄力，蓄力失败会受到 21 ({@damage 6d6}) 雷电伤害，蓄力成功则会受到一半的伤害。

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence and call down two lightning strikes from its Lightning Storm. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its stomp, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}62 ({@damage 8d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

items.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}46 ({@damage 8d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 8d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: Hold Breath
entries: 年长的恐龙可以憋气4个小时。

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its flippers. No two flipper attacks can target the same creature. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

items.name: Flipper
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Spiny Carapace
entries: The elder dinosaur is covered in an armored carapace bristling with thick, sharp spines. Any creature that hits or misses Tetzimoc with a melee attack takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

items.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The elder dinosaur has forty tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the elder dinosaur finishes a long rest.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its tail spikes in place of any or all of those attacks, and it can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

items.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) piercing damage.

items.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: Tail Spikes
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 100/300 ft., two targets. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: three with its bite, {@footnote one with its stomp, and one with its tail|{@note This statblock does not have these actions available.}}. It can use its Swallow instead of a bite.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. If the elder dinosaur has three targets {@condition restrained} in this way, it can't bite another target.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and two with its wings. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

items.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

items.name: Wing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 死亡喷射器会进行三次攻击：一次是咬，两次是爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} 命中，距离 1.5 米，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) 穿透伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} 命中，距离 1.5 米，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) 砍伤。

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw}{@hit 5}命中，范围 15/9 米，一个生物。{@h}目标必须进行{@dc 13}体质蓄力，蓄力失败会受到 18（{@damage 4d8}）点中毒伤害，成功则会受到一半的伤害。此外，救赎失败的生物会 {@condition blinded} 直到死亡使者的下一回合结束。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Gishath的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 吉萨特会进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是踩踏或尾巴。它不能对同一目标进行两次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} 命中，距离 4.5 米，一个目标。{@h}39 ({@damage 5d12 + 7}) 穿透伤害。如果目标是大型或更小型的生物，则必须在 {@dc 19} 灵巧蓄力中成功，否则会 {@condition grappled} （逃脱 {@dc 19}）。在抓取结束前，目标会 {@condition restrained}，吉夏特无法咬伤其他目标。

action.name: Swallow
entries: Gishath对它正在抓捕的大型或小型生物进行一次撕咬攻击。如果攻击命中，该生物会受到咬的伤害并被吞噬，抓捕结束。当被吞噬时，该生物是{@condition blinded}和{@condition restrained}，它对Gishath以外的攻击和其他效果有完全的掩护，并且在Gishath的每个回合开始时受到21({@damage 6d6})的酸性伤害。
如果吉沙特在单个回合内受到来自体内生物的 30 或更多伤害，它必须在该回合结束时在（%0%）体质蓄力中成功，否则就会反噬所有被吞下的生物，这些生物会（%1%）掉落在距离它 3 米以内的空间。如果吉夏特死亡，被吞下的生物将不再受到它的（%2%）影响，并且可以通过 6 米的移动距离逃离尸体，离开（%3%）。

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} 命中，距离 3 米，一个目标。{@h}29 ({@damage 5d8 + 7}) 暴击伤害，目标必须在 {@dc 19} 力量蓄力中成功，否则会被击倒 {@condition prone}。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} 命中，距离 4.5 米，一个目标。{@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) 暴击伤害。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 吉沙特进行一次踩踏或尾部攻击。

legendary.name: Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 每个在吉沙特 36 米范围内并能听到它的生物都必须在 {@dc 19} 智慧蓄力中成功，否则会在 1 分钟内变成 {@condition frightened}。生物可以在每一回合结束时重复一次蓄力，如果成功则终止对自身的影响。如果生物的蓄力成功或效果结束，则该生物在接下来的 24 小时内免疫吉夏特的怒吼。

items.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} 命中，距离 1.5 米，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) 砍伤。如果目标是生物，则必须在 DC 11 的宪法蓄力中成功，否则会感染疾病。在疾病痊愈之前，除非通过魔法手段，否则目标无法恢复命中点数，并且目标的命中点数上限每 24 小时减少 3（{@dice 1d6}）。如果目标的最高命中率因疾病而降至 0，目标就会死亡。

items.name: Multiattack
entries: 鹞鹰会进行两次攻击：一次用爪子，一次用咬。

monster.name: Sunbird
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: 太阳鸟死亡时会爆炸，它周围 9 米内的每个生物都必须进行 {@dc 18} 灵巧蓄力，蓄力失败会受到 42 ({@damage 12d6}) 火焰伤害，蓄力成功则会受到一半的伤害。爆炸会点燃该区域内未穿戴或携带的易燃物品。太阳鸟的身体会化为灰烬，但会在原地留下一颗蛋。

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: 在太阳鸟的每个回合开始时，它周围 1.5 米内的每个生物都会受到 11（{@damage 2d10}）点火伤害，该区域内未穿戴或携带的易燃物品也会被点燃。在距离太阳鸟 1.5 米范围内触碰它或用近战攻击击中它的生物会受到 11（{@damage 2d10}）点火伤害。光环还会在半径 18 米的范围内发出亮光，并在另外 18 米的范围内发出暗光。

trait.name: Flyby
entries: 当太阳鸟飞出敌人的范围时，不会引发机会攻击。

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: 太阳鸟在依靠听觉或视觉的智慧检查中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 太阳鸟进行两次爪子攻击。

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} 命中，距离 1.5 米，一个目标。{@h}16（{@damage 2d6 + 9}）次砍伤外加 14（{@damage 4d6}）次火焰伤害，目标受到{@condition grappled}（逃生{@dc 18}）。直到这次抓取结束，目标都是 {@condition restrained}，并且太阳鸟不能用该利爪攻击其他目标。在太阳鸟的每个回合开始时，一个 {@condition grappled} 生物会受到 11 ({@damage 2d10}) 火伤害。
